specific_question: What was our employee volunteer program participation rate in Q1 2025?
answer: 75% of employees participated in at least one volunteer activity, with 40 hours average volunteering per employee.
justification: Employee volunteer program metrics do not address the core DR Question focus area
dr_question: How can Elexion Automotive’s quality assurance processes be optimized to address the unique challenges of electric vehicle production, such as software and user experience issues, compared to gasoline cars?
